data.title: [Solved] Kabul is the capital of which of the following countries?&nb
data.meta_description:
The correct answer is Afghanistan.

Key Points


	Kabul is the capital and largest city of Afghanistan, located in the eastern section of th
data.text: OSSC BSSO Marks Out. Earlier, the Provisional Selection List was released. The final stage i.e CV was conducted on 23rd & 24th February 2023. The Odisha Staff Selection Commission had released the OSSC BSSO Main Written Exam Date and Revised Mains Exam Pattern. The main written exam was conducted on 8th January 2023. Also, note that this is tentative and is as per the OSSC Exam Calendar. The OSSC BSSO notification had been released on 5th August 2022 for a total number of 94 vacancies. The candidates had applied till 4th September 2022. The new notification for the same will be out soon. Candidates who wish to apply can check the OSSC BSSO Previous Year Papers which helps to crack the examination.
